name: Vinpearl Resort & Spa Ha Long
address: Reu Island, Bai Chay Ward, Quang Ninh, Hạ Long, Việt Nam
description:
Vinpearl Resort & Spa đắm chìm trong vẻ đẹp mê hồn của Vịnh Hạ Long
Hãy lánh khỏi cuộc sống thường nhật và đắm chìm trong sự sang trọng tại Vinpearl Resort & Spa Ha Long, nơi chỉ cách bờ biển của Vịnh Hạ Long 5 phút đi thuyền cao tốc. Với những dãy núi đá vôi vô cùng hùng vĩ bao quanh, khu nghỉ dưỡng 5 sao sang trọng này nằm trên một hòn đảo riêng và có ba bãi biển riêng, những khu vườn xanh mướt, những hồ bơi ngoài trời và trong nhà rộng lớn cùng một spa thư giãn. Du khách có thể thưởng thức các món ăn Việt Nam hoặc quốc tế ngon tại một trong ba nhà hàng hoặc đơn giản là thư giãn trong phòng hoặc suite rộng rãi có ban công riêng, đồng thời ngắm nhìn khung cảnh tuyệt đẹp. Cho dù du khách đang tìm kiếm một nơi lánh mình lãng mạn, kỳ nghỉ gia đình, chỗ nghỉ sang trọng, Vinpearl Resort & Spa Ha Long hứa hẹn sẽ mang đến một trải nghiệm không thể nào quên được. Sân bay gần nhất là sân bay quốc tế Cát Bi. Mỗi phòng nghỉ rộng rãi tại đây đều có máy điều hòa, ban công, TV truyền hình cáp màn hình phẳng, két an toàn và minibar. Phòng tắm riêng đi kèm bồn tắm, vòi sen, máy sấy tóc và đồ vệ sinh cá nhân. Trung tâm thể dục, các sân tennis, sân golf gần đó, sân chơi ngoài trời và CLB trẻ em cũng nằm trong số các tiện nghi của chỗ nghỉ. Chỗ nghỉ cung cấp dịch vụ thu đổi ngoại tệ, dịch vụ tiền sảnh, dịch vụ văn phòng và dịch vụ lễ tân 24 giờ.

review.comment_positive: Die Lage des Hotels sorgt für saubere Strände und ein ruhiges Umfeld. Service ist super. Nach Ankunft am Empfang des Hotels am Festland werden Gäste freundlich begrüßt und eingecheckt. Es wird ein Getränk angeboten während man auf die Fähre wartet. Diese fährt alle 15-20min. review.comment_negative: Frühstück und Abendbuffet hatten viel Auswahl, aber die Qualität der Speisen sind unterhalb der Klasse des Hotels anzusiedeln. Es gab europäische und asiatische Gerichte und diese waren lediglich mittelmäßig.

review.comment_negative: Im Hotel fühlt man sich als Gast nicht wirklich willkommen. Bereits beim Check-in soll man eine Kaution hinterlegen, um Restaurantrechnungen auf das Zimmer anschreiben zu lassen. Beim Frühstücksbuffet muss man sich per Gesichtserkennung legitimieren. Generell hat das Hauptrestaurant den typischen Charme eines All-inklusive Hotels. Es ist voll, laut, dreckig und das Personal kommt nicht hinterher die Tische abzuräumen. Generell wirkt das Personal an der Rezeption nicht kompetent und eher überfordert. Die Frage nach einem Supermarkt in der Nähe konnte nicht beantwortet werden.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe 2 Giường đơn Nhìn ra Biển
review.comment_positive:
Warm welcome from the staff. Great localisation with a nice 5min boat shuttle experience to join the main hotel.

Breakfast buffet offer a large choice.
Breakfast time was from 6 to 10.30am, I'd recommend going after 8.30 as it was crowded with many Vietnamese families before that time.

For lunch or dinner time, we tried the Pavillon space to order food as it is more peaceful and the atmosphere seemed nice. Ordered food were tasty, refined and well presented. The view is particularly enjoyable. We also tried the inside Akoya restaurant in which we found the food specially delicious! 

Globally, a great location to enjoy the view and atmosphere with complete services, equipped fitness center, indoor and outdoor swimming pool...
review.comment_negative:
Room was conformed to the global description but some comments : Pillow were super soft, I was not used to this kind of shamallow's sensation at first.
This type of room with ocean view had a small balcony, in a corner part. The view was OK but we couldn't enjoy a panoramic view of the ocean. I guess it's fine if you want to benefit from the wall shadow to avoid the sun...
For this hotel, it can be more interesting taking a room in higher floor and with swimming pool view if you'd prefer to see the outdoor flow of customers and have a direct view on the beach.

👨‍👩‍👧‍👦A lot of families and groups were present, even in week days. I guess this location is popular for families with children or large groups, it can be a bit noisy during rush hours.
Better find the right time slot if you prefer a calm moment to relax (probably between 1 to 3pm seems to have fewer people).

 🏖We didn't go swimming in the sea. I think that the sea water in this area is not that suitable to enjoy a great swimming experience. However I'd suggest better going to the beach in the afternoon, as the water goes down in the morning ; you need to wait for the sea water to reach the sand to avoid swimming in the mud.. 
 You need to take the stairs to go to the outdoor area. For people who need accessible route, need a detour to the hall and ask for a shuttle.

We arrived on Sunday afternoon, we couldn't really enjoy a late afternoon walk as we could smell pungent odors (heavy smell of sewers or trash... ?). Better enjoy the fresh sea air in the morning or other days...hopefully that didn't happen every day

Suite Executive Có Giường Cỡ King
review.comment_positive: Fantastic room. Very friendly staff, everywhere you go. 2 outdoor pools and 1 indoor, kid (94 cm) loved it. Beach and gardens well maintained. Breakfast top. Free kids club with lots of things to play. Clean gym. The whole experience was so amazing, I am not sure how someone couldn't rate it a 10 😀 at the prices we had it was a bargain (around 160 USD for the Suite), tourism is only picking up now, so I guess this will change soon 😅
review.comment_negative:
You have to be aware that the hotel is on a small Island and you have to use a free speedboat service that operates every 20 minutes (24 hours). Our Kid actually loved the boat rides 🙂
The plates at the meals might look not always perfectly clean,  but you won't find any cleaner in Vietnam. 
Also the windows were not exactly soundproof, could hear the boats in the morning and some annoying/weird bird till late at night.

review.comment_positive:
I absolutely loved this hotel! It was everything a hotel should be and great value for money. My room had ocean view overlooking Halong Bay. It was fantastic although the weather was quite gloomy. Not sure if it was pollution or just cloudy. The room was quiet. I had the most comfortable bed with the best pillows I have ever had in a hotel (and I travel a lot).  I loved the HOT shower too and that the room also had a bathtub.
My phone did not charge so I was using an outlet downstairs. One of the staff noticed and sent a charger up to my room without me having to ask. A very nice gesture.
Everything was clearly marked. The indoor swimming pool was luxury and about 28m long! Both the women and men's dressing rooms near the swimming pool have their own private jacuzzi, sauna and steam room for free use! I also had a spa treatment which was also amazing!
The breakfast options were fabulous with a wide variety for all tastes and cultures.

I ate a hamburger at one of the restaurants. Although the beef was good, the bacon was hard and full of fat which I had to take out. Otherwise, overall good quality of food.

The staff were amazing and very helpful.
The speedboats run every 20 minutes (takes 3-5 min) 24 hours which is fantastic!
Would definitely come back in a heartbeat!

There is a massive cleanup for the plastic pollution in the water at Halong Bay. I was pleasantly surprised to have only  seen 3 pieces of trash floating next to the shore. This was something I was very worried about. I stayed at the hotel and went for a day trip cruise and that was perfect!
review.comment_negative:
A few thoughts to consider:

The water bottles are located in the bathroom- so almost missed them! Better to put them in the sleeping area next to the information sheets and menu.

Housekeeping should check the shampoo, conditioner and body wash bottles to make sure they are working properly. The conditioner was not coming out and I asked for it to be refilled. It was, but it still did not come out.. Upon further inspection, the tube inside was blocked so once cleaned out, it worked perfectly!

It is absolutely fine to ask guests to write a review. However, when one is asked to write a good review or rate the hotel as a 10, this leaves a very bad taste. This is an honest review, but something to be cautious of when guests are checking out.

review.comment_positive:
The property was incredible. Very beautiful and amazing facilities. Both pools were great size. Great pool bar. The staff were amazing and really went out of their way to look after us and make us feel special. I had my birthday there and Christoph and his staff made this occasion so special.
The rooms were great size, very modern, comfy beds. bathrooms very modern, lovely showers. balcony’s lovely to sit on and look out at the harbour.
The water taxis left every 20 minutes though this was great as the waiting areas on both sides were lovely. 
The Buffett breakfast had a wide range of delicious foods. 
If we go back to ha Long Bay, I would only stay here.

review.comment_positive: The location of this hotel is so special sat on its own island 5min in a boat from land. Everything about this hotel is luxurious. As a family, we were made to feel so welcome. Loved playing volleyball and netball on the beech. The outdoor pool area is massive with a swim up bar. As you arrive  the reception area is on the mainland you are welcomed by a  very friendly reception  team who book you in and take your luggage. Whilst you wait for the boat to take you accross the marina, a welcome drink is provided to you . Overall this hotel is superb and the price of the rooms were excellent.
review.comment_negative: If I had only one negative, the food on an evening was quite expensive £27 each for a buffet not including drinks but that is to be expected of such a luxurious hotel . We took a taxi into ha long on the second  evening and found a lovely German bar called papas bbq  the food was absolutely superb and reasonably priced

review.rating: This was truly five stars experience.Perfect location,
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe có Giường cỡ King
review.comment_positive:
The location is just amazing. This is right where you would want to be when going to see Ha long Bay as you are staying there. The staff goes above and beyond to listen and work towards making the guests feel welcome. At every step(reception, guest enrollment, service, restaurant) it seems everyone is wanting to see how they can help. It was a five star experience.Some special mentions- we loved the service at the buffet. To cater to vegetarian, the actually made customized food(Pho, veg fried rice etc) and brought it out for us
The staff were so considerate and nice and understanding.Buffet staff mentions who really stood out and nice(along with others- cam van,thanh Thao ,tu linh.)

At the reception, Bach Duong and trung Duong and my hung were so helpful. They organized taxi and as it is very difficult in finding people who understand English, My hung became our point of contact to order taxi around the Ha long bay area.

The food and view at the Pavilion restaurant was just amazing.
I just loved the mystery laundry bag scheme. Thank you Vinpearl. We got all our cloths washed at such a reasonable price and sent back in 3 hours(we gave soiled cloths at 5p and amazed to see them back at 8pm)
review.comment_negative: Staff is amazing however it becomes difficult communicating as some struggle with English. They are so willing to help and want to go out of their way. I feel the resort/ business can give them classes/ interpreting solutions. That will only help bring more business . If tourists are easily able to communicate they might use more services offered ☺️

review.comment_positive:
Der beste Aufenthalt, den wir je in einem Hotel hatten! 
Wir wurden in Hanoi von einem sehr ordentlichen und netten Fahrer abgeholt. Das (E-)Auto war so gut wie neu und sehr sauber. Der Fahrer ist (trotz bekanntem Verkehrschaos in Hanoi) sehr vorsichtig und zurückhaltend gefahren. 
Im Auto gab es sogar kostenfreies Wasser für uns!
Der Empfang an der Rezeption auf dem Festland war äußerst freundlich und zuvorkommend. Uns wurde das Gepäck abgenommen und zum Zimmer gebracht. Wir sind nach schnellem Check In per Boot auf die Insel zum Hotel gefahren, wo wir ebenfalls unglaublich freundlich empfangen wurden. 
Das Zimmer war sehr groß mit eigenem Balkon und schönem Blick aufs Meers. Die Sauberkeit lies auch nicht zu wünschen übrig! Wir haben uns sofort wie zuhause gefühlt und konnten unseren Aufenthalt genießen. 
Das Frühstücksangebot ist erschlagend groß. Hier kommt jeder auf seine Kosten! Uns wurden alle Wünsche von den Lippen abgelesen und sofort erfüllt. Das Personal ist in allen Bereichen sehr sehr freundlich und zuvorkommend. 
Aufgrund unseres tollen Aufenthaltes in Ha Long Bay haben wir nun unseren Aufenthalt in Hoi An in das Vinpearl dort umgebucht. Es war einfach toll!

review.comment_positive:
﻿El hotel es muy bonito y precioso, la arquitectura es impresionante, un hotel elevado encima de una pequeña isla con sus playas privadas y sus piscinas. Fabuloso. Y el equipo super amable la verdad, y muy paciente. ﻿ ﻿El wifi está bueno cuando está conectado y como lo tienes que conectar todos los dos por tres pues no ayuda a tener una buena conexión. .﻿El restaurante de fuera, sobre islotes, es súper interesante y fue una sorpresa para nosotros, se ve que al jefe de cocina le encanta su trabajo, gustos interesantes y precio razonable al precio del buffet. También si quieres picar algo en la piscina, la carta no está mal y los smoothies son muy buenos. ﻿ También si os gusta dormir con calor hay que preguntar porque todas las habitaciones no lo tienen. También hay que preguntar qué al momento que vais a venir vivir la experiencia de este hotel, no hay reformas, porque da igual que pagas o no, ya pueden hacer ruido tapando por la mañana. 
﻿por suerte cada vez que te pasa algo hacen todo para rectificar la situación, o darte algo de compensación. Y esta muy bien pero nosotros hemos tenido demasiadas cosas en poco tiempo y es una lastima. Tienen siempre la sonrisa y la educación esto no lo podemos negar. Así que gracias a ellos para probar de hacérnoslos pasar lo mejor posible. Volvería sin dudas pero cuando hayan arreglado estos detalles que te pueden molestar.
review.comment_negative: ﻿Pero les falta mucho para entender al cliente. No somos maquinas de dinero, hacen pagar las bolas y raquetas de tenis más el terreno es un poco vergonzoso por un 5 estrellas, nunca había visto esto y bueno no hablo de mi cita de la peluquería que casi me destruye el pelo. ﻿Por lo de los restaurantes, no hay nada de otro mundo y algo seguro que lo que enseñan en las fotos, no tiene nada que ver con lo que tendréis. El buffet principal es básico y caro por lo que es, no lo recomiendo porque es más caro que a la carta!! No hay restaurantes típico japonés como lo dicen en la descripción.﻿ También te pueden preguntar más dinero para tener la vista al océano, pero no hay que olvidar que es una isla, al final está el océano todo alrededor del hotel. ﻿ Hay un tour de barco en el hotel, pensábamos que fuera diferente pero no, es el mismo tour que los de internet o los que puedes encontrar en una tienda. O sea, eres solo dinero. Va todo rápido, en el barco las bebidas las tienes que pagar igual el agua durante la comida, y la comida pues es una vergüenza también. No les cuesta absolutamente nada pero tú pagas caro. También hay que saber que hay muchísima gente, no es agradable y llegamos al mismo momento que todos los otros tour al mismo lugar, para decir que para disfrutar de esta maravilla del mundo, es complicado. Si tenéis la oportunidad y el dinero mejor un tour privado con vuestro barco así podrías ir donde queréis y al momento que queréis.

review.comment_positive: We didn’t like the view of our room so we told our check in reception and they were kind enough to change a room with spectacular view for us ! Our daughter had serious stomach pain and they called a nurse to our room and arranged speed boat to take us to the port and helped with transition to the hospital close by ! They were so thoughtful when we came back from the hospital it was already pass breakfast hour but they allowed us to have some food before we check out. On our way to check out , they came and asked about the well being of our daughter and gave us bottles of water and send us off ! Loved their service and genuine attitude ! The swimming pool was really nice , too
review.comment_negative: It’s just that you should know every time u go back to ur hotel u need to wait for a speed boat and then take the speed boat back to the hotel , then a tutu , so if u mind the time and the distance then it may not be the best choice ! review.comment_positive: My stay at Vinpearl Resort Ha Long Bay was a mixed experience. The location was fantastic, offering stunning views of the bay, and the staff was friendly and accommodating. However, I couldn't help but notice that the hotel itself was showing signs of age and wear. The need for renovation was evident in various aspects of the property, from the outdated decor to the worn-out facilities. While the cleanliness was maintained, the overall ambiance left something to be desired. With a renovation, this resort has the potential to shine even brighter and provide an even more enjoyable stay for its guests.

22h30 order đồ thì nhân viên báo còn mỗi phở bò và gà. Trong khi menu rất nhiều món phục vụ từ 22h-6h sáng hôm sau. Giữa biển mà order mực khô không có. Nhân viên phục vụ chậm, báo kiểm tra lại thực đơn và gọi lại mà chờ hoài ko thấy. Thanh toán và trả tiền thừa mất hơn 30p.

Phòng không rộng.

review.rating: Good choice for a resort style stay
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe 2 Giường Đơn
review.comment_positive: An unique hotel in an somewhat unique location (private island) which makes a (free) boat transfer necessary. Very nice property with excellent pool area. Breakfast with stunning views to HaLong Bay and nice choices. Rooms large and comfy. Staff most of the time very friendly.
review.comment_negative: For 5* stars, a bit inconsistent. Some staff members speak great English, some not. Some are very friendly, some not. Most of the time clean rooms, but spots in the bathroom and at outside areas. Some parts of the hotel (stairs, walls) start to look dated already. Buffett dinner not recommended. Feels like a better canteen. The other restaurant is very expensive. Overall, the hotel rooms are very expensive for HaLong. Boat transfer ends at an uninviting area, walking to more downtown areas feels not safe.

review.comment_positive:
отличная территория, приятные номера (не самые просторные, но милые), прекрасный вид на бухту. почти у всех номеров 4+ этажа. 
отличная детская комната.
пляж на момент нашего пребывания переоборудовали к сезону, была техника. но это не очень нас расстроило, потому что бассейн огромный. есть детский, есть взрослый. взяли FB на 3 ночи и не прогадали. выезжать никуда не хотелось, а буфет достаточно разнообразный для нескольких дней пребывания, надоесть не успел. отель на острове, каждые 20 мин к большой земле ходит их катер практически 24/7.
review.comment_negative: удивительным образом персонал ресепшн еле-еле говорит на английском. все ооочень медленно и мучительно. в детской комнате шикарное расписание активностей, только персоналу приходится про них напоминать. доп услуги в отеле (круиз в бухту, трансфер, спа салон) х2-3 реальной цены.

review.rating: nhân viên thiếu cộng tác, dịch vụ kém, đầu bếp vụng, Dịch vụ Vin ngày nay xuống cấp nghiêm trọng
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe có Giường cỡ King
review.comment_negative:
phòng dọn bẩn, yêu cầu kê giường Extra thì yc từ tầm 10 g sáng, đến 12 g vẫn ko kê mặc dù nhân viên dọn phòng đang ở khu đó; đến chiều gọi cho room service thì lát sau có bạn nam mang giuong lên và bỏ lại phòng, nói rằng lát nữa mới có nguoi đến trải gas, mình bảo hãy gọi ngay họ đến đây, tại sao cứ thích làm phiền khách nhiều vậy, anh ta đồng ý nhưng cả tiếng sau vẫn ko thấy có nguoi đến; lại phải gọi cho lễ tân… nói chung mất 1,44 triệu cho cái extra bed mà mất thêm bao nhiêu thời gian và sự bực mình; 
sau đó, đến vụ thẻ bị hỏng, ngưoi làm thẻ setting sai ngày
tiếp đến là chuyện đặt đồ ăn lên phòng, mình đi nhiều nơi, nhưng chưa thấy đầu bếp nào tệ như đầu bếp Vin hạ long; toàn món đắt tiền : sườn BBQ giá 350 mà nấu dở hơn mình nấu; món mực hạ long chua cay thì nấu lỗng bỗng như canh hải sản…! phải nói là dịch vụ của Vin Hạ long quả là xuống cấp nghiêm trọng và ko tương sứng với giá tiền 4.5 triệu / phòng/ ngày. Thêm nữa ăn xong lúc 20 g mình gọi điện cho lễ tân bảo cho người lên dọn đồ, lễ tân nói chút nữa sẽ có nguoi lên: nhưng mình đi chơi đến 22.30 quay về phòng vẫn còn nguyên, kéo theo cái mùi thức ăn bám hết vào chăn ga… ko biết phải nói thế nào, mình đành tự dọn bỏ ra cửa phòng
cái phòng mình ở là cái phòng mà chiều đến toàn bộ ánh mặt trời soi rọi vào cửa, nắng và nóng đến tận giường, ko thể kéo rèm ra mà phải kéo kín cả cái rèm đen kịt , tối om…chẳng còn view vườn view biển gì nữa. mình yc đổi phòng nhưng nhân viên lễ tân bảo phải trả thêm 960k nữa thì mới đổi cho mình… ui, chán Vinpearl Hạ Long quá!

Great location. it's easy to get to and from, and still enjoy the mainland. It's a different experience going by boat to an island with a big hotel on it. It has an amazing swimming pool, and the staff at the pool bar on Monday 24th was so friendly and made great cocktails.  There were a lot of families and children very busy and noisy but if you pick the right times you can avoid them. 
Interesting experience and worth it for us.

review.rating: Overall we had a great experience and would love to come back one day.
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe có Giường cỡ King
review.comment_positive: We had an exceptional stay at Vinpearl Hotel and Spa. The room was fantastic and came with excellent amenities. The staff were friendly and helpful, and the pools and facilities were superb. The kids' playroom was wonderful, and getting to and from the island was incredibly easy. The views from the rooms and the hotel towards the floating islands were breathtaking. The building itself was stunning, and we enjoyed exploring the island. The breakfast buffet was outstanding, and the room service was equally impressive.
review.comment_negative:
On our first night, we had some trouble finding an open restaurant, partly because the staff had limited English proficiency. However, we returned to our room and found the room service to be excellent. 

Also despite the sheets and duvet covers were very clean and soft, they did have some tears, which was disappointing.

review.comment_positive: The hotel occupies a small island and is a real gem. Top quality facilities - great pool (1.4 m deep all the way, about 70 m long and 15 to 30 metres wide. One can enjoy swimming in different directions) and a good gym open from 6 a.m. to late in the evening. There is also a kids' pool. The room gives you a spectacular view of the town and ocean. The boat can take you to the shore every 20 minutes. However, we stayed in the hotel most of the time having visited the biggest local supermarket (Go Halong) one day. It is not really a place to go out shopping and eating. Enjoy your time in the hotel and its excellent facilities, including a tennis court!

Cách phục vụ, và chất lượng phòng quá kém. Lúc mình đi vào trước dịp lễ vào ngày 27 đến ngày 29. 
Mình check-in được 2 tiếng mới có hành lý. Mình ở phòng 306. Lúc ở thì bồn tắm bị tắc, máy sấy tóc hỏng, ổ điện khó cắm, điện thoại trong phòng không làm việc, giường mà mình được phụ thu 1 triệu 800 nghìn/ 1 đêm quá là kém.
Mình đánh giá chỗ này không được xứng đáng gọi là 5 sao. Mình và đoàn mình đánh giá chỗ này được 3 sao.

review.comment_negative:
Nhưng có vài điểm mình góp ý
1. ly uống nước bằng thuỷ tinh chưa vệ sinh sạch. Đáy ly vẫn dính vệt màng trắng hình như của sữa. 
2. Khi vào nhận phòng, mình không thấy nhân viên nói đến các chú ý khi vào ăn sáng tại nhà hàng Bayview. Sáng hôm sau, gia đình mình xuống nhà hàng ăn sáng, thì chồng mình mặc áo ba lỗ và nhân viên từ chối phục vụ, yêu cầu về thay trang phục áo phông hoặc có cổ mới cho vào. Mình ngạc nhiên vì ngay ban đầu ko thấy các bạn phổ biến cho khách. Như vậy Khách sẽ chủ động và đỡ có sự trải nghiệm tệ về kỳ nghỉ dưỡng. Hy vọng các bạn sẽ cải thiện được vấn đề này trong tương lai.

review.rating: Beautiful villas if you just want to relax
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe có Giường cỡ King
review.comment_positive: Really beautiful villas, perfect for relaxing. Room service was very affordable, beach was close by. Plenty of choice at breakfast, the villas are super spacious. It’s perfect if you want a couple of days just soaking up the sun.
review.comment_negative:
The hotel is quite far away from any amenities, so to get to a busy area like Duong Dong it cost around 700,000 VND round trip in a Grab taxi, which ate into our spends. It is also in a ‘Disneyland’ like area, but is unfinished so it felt kind of eerie driving past. 
Lastly, we found it difficult at times to communicate with hotel staff due to language barrier.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe có Giường cỡ King
review.comment_positive: The private island experience, clean rooms, nice pool and beach.
review.comment_negative: There was a big fire on the point of the island which I enquired about because I got worried it would catch fire to nearby trees and the 3G tower. The staff explained that periodically they will burn some leaves in the wet season. The fire looked at least 3 meters and there was quite a lot of smoke. They appolgized and said that they were looking for solution for the near future. I hope they will keep their promise because it isn't sustainable at all.

review.rating: Luxury stay - Get the King Suite if you can
review.room_type: Suite Executive Có Giường Cỡ King
review.comment_positive: Stunning!! Absolutely stunning!! I can't recommend this enough. We had a very busy 10 days prior to this, so keep that in mind as it probably played a part in just how much we loved it here. From the luxury entrance to the private jetty to the king suite with dual balcony it was just amazing. We hid away here for two nights, then added a third on as we didn't want to leave. The place was quiet at was early March, but everything was staffed well and open inc the pavilion restaurant which is expensive (for the area) but worth it if you're into a bit of fine dining. The other two night we spend in the room looking out over the sea views and sipping on 1,000,000 wine (about £30). We ordered room service as well both nights we we usually can't justify the prices for, but these where reasonable and very, very nice. After a while of eating Pho and spring rolls a juicy burger and chips was a nice taste of home. If you can spring for the King suite although the other rooms did look very good a most seemed to face the sea. The out door and in door pools were great, indoor was heated and the swim up pool bar was a nice touch. My wife had a facial and a massage. She had two else where in Vietnam and these where just as good so worth the extra expense. I tried to save some money by using the free gym which was well kitted out. It's a must go if you're in Ha long bay and want to treat yourself.
